attributes.action: cut the anount of tax that is put on the price of Petrol and Diesel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What is going on with the price of Petrol and Diesel? Over £1 per litre.. absoulute disgrace. The price just keeps going up and up. 
Cut the price of fuel Tax NOW!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
